title: Operation / Documentation Staff (Fluent In Chinese)
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH AIR TIGER EXPRESS LOGISTICS VIỆT NAM
job_description:
- To be well familiar with AMS / ACI filing process for all shipments to TPS/CAN ports sector.
- To be responsible for the operational results and administration of all containers services, traffic and network connections, provide the highest level of service at the lowest cost.
- To provide a consistently high level of service to internal and external customers.
- Minimize risk by dealing with vendors and carriers to reduce delays, diminish claims and maintain security.
- Handling claims, complaint and queries and proactively following through to resolution for Customer satisfaction purpose.
- To offer schedule information, service parameters, and release and cut-off information, shipping instructions (bookings), changes in destination, delays in transit, and customer inquiries or complaints.
- To respond in a timely manner to queries (both internal and external) pertaining to export documentation issues and to strive at all times to meet established quality guidelines.
requirements:
- At least 02-year-experience of similar job in logistic/forwarder company
- Knowing Chinese
- Experience in using system for bookings, documentation, intranet.
- Experience with all aspects of operation procedures.
- English: Intermediate level
